description: This file defines a React functional component 'ToolsPage' for a frontend web application. The component provides a user interface to invoke backend tools via an API, with form inputs for provider, tool, tenant ID, connector ID, and arguments. It manages state, handles API calls, and displays results or errors accordingly.

methods.name: ToolsPage
methods.description: React functional component that renders a UI for invoking external tools via an API.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Asynchronous function that constructs payload and calls 'invokeTool' API; updates the state with results or errors.
